articles.author: Daniel Lawler
articles.title: Creeping ice clouding vision of Europe space telescope Euclid - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists are trying to melt a thin layer of ice that is increasingly clouding the vision of the "dark universe detective" space telescope Euclid, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Scientists are trying to melt a thin layer of ice that is increasingly clouding the vision of the "dark universe detective" space telescope Euclid, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.
